definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: It may be Spain's most short-lived public company.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是西班牙史上最短命的上市公司。

sentences.english: Related parties impropriate listed company lots of funds.
sentences.chinese: 关联方占用了上市公司较多资金。

sentences.english: Equity swap between shareholders of the listed company and shareholders of Huixin Futures.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司股东与汇鑫期货股东进行股权置换。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT The cost of capital is one of the most important factors in making decision of re-raising capital for all marketed companies.
sentences.chinese: 论文摘要融资成本是上市公司融资决策的重要依据。

sentences.english: The publicly listed company is controlled by his family.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司汤臣集团由汤子嘉家族控股。

sentences.english: Listed companies are not generally required to issue paid announcements in gazetted newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司毋须在宪报指定报章刊登付款公布披露资料。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 makes a positive study of divestiture performance of the listed-company.
sentences.chinese: 第四章做了一个上市公司资产剥离的市场绩效分析。

sentences.english: In recent years, concocting behavior of accountancy in China's listed company hasn't been forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 近几年来，我国上市公司的会计造假行为屡禁不止。

sentences.english: Thirdly, we should make use of ownership balance reasonably.
sentences.chinese: 最后建议上市公司合理利用股权制衡的治理作用。

sentences.english: The effect of cash dividend initiations on the long-run market value of companies was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了首次现金股利对上市公司长期价值的影响。

sentences.english: The relevant provisions of the state shall be followed in the transfer of state-owned equities of listed companies.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司的国有股权转让，按照国家有关规定执行。

sentences.english: At present, the overseas listed company also plans to implement equity-based incentives.
sentences.chinese: 目前，海外上市公司还计划实施股权激励。

sentences.english: Finally, this article ends with providing some advice for the public companies regarding the improvement of accounting information quality.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对我国上市公司会计信息质量提出建议。

sentences.english: It’s a NASDAQ-listed company with shareholders to please.
sentences.chinese: 这是纳斯达克上市公司，需要让股东满意。

sentences.english: As to be listed, realizes the shareholder wealth maximization is the hard truth after all.
sentences.chinese: 作为上市公司，毕竟实现股东财富最大化才是硬道理。

sentences.english: Right offering is often a main re-financing means of listed companies in China.
sentences.chinese: 在我国，配股一直是上市公司股权再融资的主要手段。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
